title: Server Engineer - Quận 4, HCM
company_name: CÔNG TY TNHH PHÁT TRIỂN HỆ THỐNG NICHIETSU
job_description:
Implement and maintain essential IT infrastructure, including physical/virtual VM servers, SAN storages, RedHat, VMware.
Take responsibility for IT infrastructure design and implementation of IT project following UOB standard.
Installing, configurating and maintaining Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) systems, VMware vSphere environments (ESXi, vCenter).
Virtual machine provisioning and management.
Troubleshooting Linux-based issues, Virtualization issues.
Managing server performance.
Implementing and managing Red Hat technologies like Ansible, OpenShift, etc.
Scripting (Bash, Python) for automation.
Work with relevant parties and provide/implement IT infrastructure architect in IT projects.
Follow up with relevant team and provide update/report for IT Infrastructure related matters.
requirements:
English proficiency
Proven success in an IT role, especially as a Server Administrator or similar role.
Experience in physical server, SAN storage and database setup and virtual computing management (specifically VMware products).
Experience in RHEL, Linux system administration.
Scripting skill.
Good time management skill.
